titles.title: Thy Loving Kindness Is Better Than Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thy lovingkindness is better than life,
Thy lovingkindness is better than life;
My lips shall praise Thee, thus will I bless Thee,
Thy lovingkindness is better than life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I will lift my hands up unto Thy name...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: My soul He satisfies with marrow and fatness...
